alert.note: Alert for Pratt (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 3:29PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Pratt County through 415 PM CDT... At 329 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pratt, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Pratt around 335 PM CDT. Iuka around 345 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Cairo and Preston. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
